price: (15) They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."
arabic: قَالُواْ مَآ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا تَكۡذِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū mā antum illā basharun mith'lunā wamā anzala al-raḥmānu min shayin in antum illā takdhibūna
